scripts.build-aarch64: cargo build --features "latest" --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu && node ../scripts/index.js build --target-triple aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build-i686: cargo build --features "latest" --target i686-pc-windows-msvc && node ../scripts/index.js build --target-triple i686-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build-i686-release: cargo build --release --features "latest" --target i686-pc-windows-msvc && node ../scripts/index.js build --release --target-triple i686-pc-windows-msvc
